title: Looking for a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to manage and optimize ad campaigns.
job_overview:
Looking for a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to manage and optimize ad campaigns.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on ability

Duties:

Manage paid ads across platforms.

Optimize for best KPIs.

Provide performance insights remotely.

Requirements:

Over 1 year experience in ads management.

Analytical, data-focused mindset.
